patterns: what is criteria for admission in fast?
responses: Criteria varies here for Engineering  60 in SSC and 60 in HSSC For Computing 60 in SSC and 50 in HSSC

patterns: on what basis my selection is eligible
responses: selection criteria for all program is : 50% of your HSSC or SSC and 50% of your NU test score

patterns: what is test pattern for nu test ?
responses: for Engineering and Computing English 10% , IQ 20% , Basic Math 20% , Advance Math 50%
Yes it offers Scholarships as well as Loan assitance you can check it on nu.edu.pk/Admissions/Scholarship

patterns: in which programs does fast offers admissions ?
responses: It offers these programs BS Computer Science , Artificial Intelligence, Software Engineering and Cyber Security

patterns: How much do I have to pay?
How much is the tuition fee?
responses: For all the programs, it is 8500 per credit hour.
You can apply online on this website link admission.nu.edu.pk
